summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Python interface to ANSYS MAPDL, exercising command execution, parameter handling, file operations, session management, error handling, logging, and gRPC communication to ensure the API behaves correctly under various scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the MAPDL Python integration used in engineering simulation workflows, enabling developers and users to trust that commands, data exchange, and session control function as expected.
